## 1. Read in the data
```{r}
if(!file.exists("met_all.gz")){
  download.file("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/USCbiostats/data-science-data/master/02_met/met_all.gz", "met_all.gz", method="libcurl", timeout = 60)
}

met <- data.table::fread("met_all.gz")
```
